p: Considering the cytotoxicity effects, although there is no study on the cytotoxicity of FMEO, the cytotoxic effects of some Ferula species such as F. diversivittata, F. persica, F. ovina, F. badrakema, and F. latisecta and the oleo gum resin of F. assafoetida against various cancer and normal cell lines including the HepG2 human liver cancer cell line, the A549 human adenocarcinoma cell line, the HT29 human colorectal adenocarcinoma cell line, the MCF7 breast cancer cell line, the MDBK renal cancer cell line, 4T1 breast cancer cells, and the Vero kidney cell line, with IC 50 values ranging from 6 to 321 Î¼g/mL, have been evaluated in several studies [ 45, 46, 47, 48, 49, 50].
